dialog:
Good job once more. It can take some time for your neural net to adjust to flying.
Whenever you get the chance, try to practise.
Just a few more tests now. On this next one, you'll have a gun. Use it to destroy the lights found in the simulation.

Crashing into the light does not count for this test.
Use the spacebar to activate your gun and blow them up.
Your system readings indicate this should be fairly easy for you to do.
